articles.author: Amar Pal Singh Bhalla
articles.title: Asia Cup 2023 [WATCH]: Pakistan's Babar Azam left in astonishment by Taskin Ahmed's magnificent delivery | PAK vs BAN - Cricket Times
articles.description: Pakistan continued their remarkable streak with another convincing victory, defeating Bangladesh by seven wickets in the first match of the Super Four stage in the Asia Cup 2023, held in Lahore. This marked the conclusion of the tournament's Pakistan leg, wit…
